subject: Haptic pedal adapters
description_text:
Hi there,

I have just seen that you now have new horizontal adapters for the haptic motors. When I bought my pedals they came with the z shaped adapters which are not very good.

I would like to get the new U shape adapters, and I just wanted to ask if there was any discount for buyers who have already purchased the previous set.

Thanks.

Best regards,
Ryan

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Burns,  Hello, you can place an order directly for these small accessories. Our profit on them is minimal, as the main cost comes from shipping.Â
